title: Greek Island Escape at Award-Winning Boutique Hotel with Organic Breakfast, Airport Transfers and BBQ Dinner
description: Escape to the Greek island of Naxos with a stay at Halcyon Villas, awarded Best Greek Honeymoon Resort 2019 and the Best Villas and Holidays Homes Award at the Greek Hospitality Awards 2018. The largest of the Cyclades island group, Naxos is best known for its secluded beaches and Apollo Temple, and is the perfect launchpad for visiting Mykonos and Paros. Get a taste for the Mediterranean with daily in-room breakfast, one BBQ dinner for two and a welcome basket of handmade local treats. Also includes return airport transfers.
